techmeme.title: The second developer beta of iOS 18.2 shows a "daily limit" for free access to "advanced" ChatGPT via Siri and an option to upgrade to ChatGPT Plus in Settings (Juli Clover/MacRumors)
Anthropic releases Claude 3.5 Haiku, but it is priced at $1 per million input tokens, up 4x from Claude 3.0 Haiku's price, and lacks image analysis features (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Elon Musk's lawyers claim in a Pennsylvania court that the $1M/day giveaway to registered voters, which Musk said multiple times is "random", is not a lottery (The Philadelphia Inquirer)
The US NLRB alleges Grindr illegally imposed a return-to-office policy last year forcing out ~80 of its 178 staffers in an attempt to thwart a unionization push (Josh Eidelson/Bloomberg)
Netflix plans to delist nearly all of its interactive shows and films as of December 1 saying the tech "served its purpose", after launching the format in 2017 (Jay Peters/The Verge)
